articles.author: Greg Iacurci
articles.title: Quit a job? You likely can't collect unemployment benefits - CNBC
articles.description: Americans are quitting their jobs in record numbers. They generally can't count on unemployment benefits as a financial buffer.
articles.content:
Americans are quitting their jobs in record numbers. However, they likely won't qualify for unemployment benefits.
Just over 4.4 million people quit in September, an increase of 164,000 from the pri… [+2985 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Brazil becomes first South American team to qualify for 2022 World Cup - The Star Online
articles.description: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -     Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO (Reuters) - Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Unhappy Ozil sent stern message by Fenerbahce president Koc as ex-Arsenal star told to focus on football - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi's Argentina and Neymar's Brazil are leading South American qualifying for the 2022 FIFA World Cup. The top four qualify directly and the fifth-place team will advance to a playoff.
